H0.text: Which famous chemist was executed in the French Revolution. Jean Dumas

H1.text: Which famous chemist was executed in the French Revolution. Claude-Louis Berthollet

H2.text: Which famous chemist was executed in the French Revolution. Joseph Priestley

H3.text: Which famous chemist was executed in the French Revolution. Lavosier

A4.text: Lavoisier was convicted and guillotined on 8 May 1794 in Paris, at the age of 50, along with his 27 co-defendants.
